short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly access and reuse your ChatGPT/Ollama/Claude.ai prompt templates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Promptist is a simple extension that allows users to bring up a "Prompt Palette" where they can select, manage and re-use their LLM prompt templates.
